title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The bug report is missing a description.
EB: This should at a maximum only be one redraw for each visible line.
SR: Add the following line to StyledText performPaint to see the redraws occurring: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
